meanings.definition: The point of concurrency of the altitudes of a triangle.
meanings.sent1: In geometry class, we learned about the orthocenters of different triangles.
meanings.sent2: The orthocenters of various triangles were marked on the diagram.
meanings.sent3: The orthocenters of the triangle decided to have a meeting at the highest point.
meanings.sent4: The orthocenters of knowledge, wisdom, and experience intersected in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The orthocenters of the triangle were like meeting points of three different paths.
